params.name: size
params.description: Dictionary in the format {height: int, width: int} specifying the size of the output image.

params.name: resample
params.description: PILImageResampling filter to use when resizing the image e.g. PILImageResampling.BICUBIC.

params.name: data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the output image. If unset, the channel dimension format of the inputimage is used. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.none or ChannelDimension.NONE: image in (height, width) format.

params.name: input_data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the input image. If unset, the channel dimension format is inferredfrom the input image. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.none or ChannelDimension.NONE: image in (height, width) format.
